department: Public Works and Government Services Canada
short_summary: IT security services are required to bolster and augment the existing IT Security community
description: Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC), Digital Services Branch (DSB), Cyber Security Directorate (CSD) requires the services of IT Security Professionals
full_summary:
# Invitation to Tender for Cyber Protection Services (Stream 6)
**Notice ID:** PW-23-01021775  
**Solicitation ID:** 20230528   
**Publication Date:** 2023-01-17  
**Closing Date:** 2023-03-14T14:00:00 

**Contracting Agency:**
Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC)
**Address:** 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage  
**Gatineau, Quebec, Canada K1A 0S5**

**About this Tender:**
Public Works and Government Services Canada is seeking the services of IT Security Professionals, consisting of a minimum of four (4), level 2 resources, as defined by Stream 6 of the Task Based Informatics Professional Services (TBIPS). 

**Scope of Work:**
This project involves bolstering and augmenting the existing IT Security community within Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC) while the IT Security Program expands its role or presence. Bidders are required to submit a bid for all resource categories, as the work is currently not being performed by a contracted resource.

**Eligibility and Requirements:**
The following applies:

* A minimum of four (4) level 2 resources, as per Stream 6 of TBIPS, are required.
* Bidders must be from countries participating in trade agreements (listed below).
* Specific trade agreements that apply to this tender are:
	+ Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
	+ Quebec-New York Corridor Agreement
	+ Ontario-Quebec Trade and Cooperation Agreement
	+ General Agreement on Tariffs and Trade (GATT)
	+ Atlantic Procurement Agreement
	+ Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
	+ World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
	+ Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
	+ Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
	+ Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
	+ Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
	+ Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
	+ Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
	+ Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
	+ Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
	+ Quebec-New Brunswick Procurement Agreement
	+ Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

**Trade Agreements are Subject to Change. It is the
